optimization_lever.description: Add rank-aware fast paths in validate_matrix_shape batch-lane validation
optimization_lever.rationale: Linalg entrypoints frequently validate rank-2/rank-3/rank-4 shapes; short-circuiting these common ranks avoids iterator/try_fold overhead while preserving identical validation semantics.
optimization_lever.risk_note: Optimization only changes internal control flow for batch-lane multiplication; reason-code families and error-class outcomes remain unchanged.

isomorphism.ordering_tiebreak_note: Rank-aware fast paths only bypass generic try_fold for rank-2/3/4 batch-lane multiplication; rows/cols validation, overflow handling, and budget-fail behavior remain behavior-isomorphic.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin generate_packet008_optimization_report
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_test_contract_gate
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_security_gate

rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_reliability.json --retries 1 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0

notes: Profile report captures baseline/rebaseline distributions with environment fingerprint and reproducibility command.
Isomorphism checks passed for valid ranks, rank<2 failure, budget overflow, and multiplication overflow cases.
Optimization accepted under EV gate with score 24.0 >= 2.0 and no observed behavior drift.
Post-change workflow scenario gate rerun passed with 355/355 cases and coverage_ratio=1.0.
